name: MapsI Source
subtitle: GPS Navigation open source
description: AltStore source for MapsI - GPS navigation app using OpenStreetMap.

apps.name: MapsI
apps.subtitle: GPS Navigation with OpenStreetMap
apps.localizedDescription: MapsI is a GPS navigation app alternative to Apple Maps, Waze and Google Maps. Features: Address search, GPS navigation with voice guidance, 4 transport modes (car, walking, cycling, public transit), OpenStreetMap maps, 100% free and open source.

versions.localizedDescription: Initial release with address search, GPS navigation, 4 transport modes, and voice guidance.

privacy.NSLocationWhenInUseUsageDescription: MapsI uses your location to display your position on the map and calculate routes.
privacy.NSLocationAlwaysAndWhenInUseUsageDescrip: MapsI uses your location in background for navigation guidance.

news.title: MapsI v1.0.0 Available
news.caption: First version of MapsI - Open source GPS navigation
